p:
Finally, competitive balance index was calculated as:
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$ \mathrm{C}{\mathrm{B}}_{\mathrm{a}}=\mathsf{In}\left(\mathrm{R}{\mathrm{Y}}_{\mathrm{a}}/\mathrm{R}{\mathrm{Y}}_{\mathrm{b}}\right) $$\end{document}
C
B a
= In
R
Y a
/ R
Y b
